      • getCached

        public static Pair<Long,Long> getCached(DataSpec dataSpec,
                                        Cache cache,
                                        @Nullable
                                        CacheKeyFactory cacheKeyFactory)
        Queries the cache to obtain the request length and the number of bytes already cached for a given DataSpec.
        Parameters:
        dataSpec - Defines the data to be checked.
        cache - A Cache which has the data.
        cacheKeyFactory - An optional factory for cache keys.
        Returns:
        A pair containing the request length and the number of bytes that are already cached.

      • cache

        public static void cache(DataSpec dataSpec,
                         Cache cache,
                         @Nullable
                         CacheKeyFactory cacheKeyFactory,
                         DataSource upstream,
                         @Nullable
                         CacheUtil.ProgressListener progressListener,
                         @Nullable
                         AtomicBoolean isCanceled)
                  throws IOException,
                         InterruptedException
        Caches the data defined by dataSpec, skipping already cached data. Caching stops early if the end of the input is reached.
        Parameters:
        dataSpec - Defines the data to be cached.
        cache - A Cache to store the data.
        cacheKeyFactory - An optional factory for cache keys.
        upstream - A DataSource for reading data not in the cache.
        progressListener - A listener to receive progress updates, or null.
        isCanceled - An optional flag that will interrupt caching if set to true.
        Throws:
        IOException - If an error occurs reading from the source.
        InterruptedException - If the thread was interrupted directly or via isCanceled.

      • cache

        public static void cache(DataSpec dataSpec,
                         Cache cache,
                         @Nullable
                         CacheKeyFactory cacheKeyFactory,
                         CacheDataSource dataSource,
                         byte[] buffer,
                         PriorityTaskManager priorityTaskManager,
                         int priority,
                         @Nullable
                         CacheUtil.ProgressListener progressListener,
                         @Nullable
                         AtomicBoolean isCanceled,
                         boolean enableEOFException)
                  throws IOException,
                         InterruptedException
        Caches the data defined by dataSpec while skipping already cached data. Caching stops early if end of input is reached and enableEOFException is false.

        If a PriorityTaskManager is given, it's used to pause and resume caching depending on priority and the priority of other tasks registered to the PriorityTaskManager. Please note that it's the responsibility of the calling code to call PriorityTaskManager.add(int) to register with the manager before calling this method, and to call PriorityTaskManager.remove(int) afterwards to unregister.

        Parameters:
        dataSpec - Defines the data to be cached.
        cache - A Cache to store the data.
        cacheKeyFactory - An optional factory for cache keys.
        dataSource - A CacheDataSource that works on the cache.
        buffer - The buffer to be used while caching.
        priorityTaskManager - If not null it's used to check whether it is allowed to proceed with caching.
        priority - The priority of this task. Used with priorityTaskManager.
        progressListener - A listener to receive progress updates, or null.
        isCanceled - An optional flag that will interrupt caching if set to true.
        enableEOFException - Whether to throw an EOFException if end of input has been reached unexpectedly.
        Throws:
        IOException - If an error occurs reading from the source.
        InterruptedException - If the thread was interrupted directly or via isCanceled.

      • remove

        public static void remove(DataSpec dataSpec,
                          Cache cache,
                          @Nullable
                          CacheKeyFactory cacheKeyFactory)
        Removes all of the data specified by the dataSpec.
        Parameters:
        dataSpec - Defines the data to be removed.
        cache - A Cache to store the data.
        cacheKeyFactory - An optional factory for cache keys.

      • remove

        public static void remove(Cache cache,
                          String key)
        Removes all of the data specified by the key.
        Parameters:
        cache - A Cache to store the data.
        key - The key whose data should be removed.
